How do I add a new $type to Backdrop's simplified VBO system? I am looking at OG right now and it looks like the bulk actions are there and are using hook_action_info correctly, but the type is og_membership (for example) rather than any of the core options. They aren't showing up in Views.
https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/og/issues/22

Views / Bulk Operations missing · Issue #22 · backdrop-contrib/og
I'm looking into the Views and it seems the Bulk Operations aren't showing up in Backdrop. (Maybe it's looking for a vbo module in the code -- which is in core, I think?).
I've wondered about porting vbo or adding missing pieces to core

Noting that we already have a meta for VBO feature parity: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3797

[META] VBO: Feature parity with 7.x · Issue #3797 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Here's the options we provide when configuring VBO (same as D8 core Views, so, we have feature parity): Here's what VBO 7.x provides: Features/options missing: #802 | Option to have either ...
Does this mean what I'm after is not (yet) possible?
